ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ay1:1.1_0: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ay1:1.2_0: At that time Venerable Udāyī was associating with and visiting a number of families in Sāvatthī.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ay1:1.3_0: One of those families that supported him had given their daughter in marriage to the son of another family.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ay1:1.4_0: After robing up one morning, he took his bowl and robe and went to that family.

ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ay1:1.13_1: After approaching, he sat down alone on a private and concealed seat suitable for action. When they were able, they just chatted; otherwise he gave her a teaching. When they passed away, they gave her a teaching.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ay1:1.14_0: At that time Visākhā Migāramātā had many healthy children and grandchildren, and she was considered very auspicious.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ay1:1.15_0: At sacrifices, ceremonies, and celebrations people would feed Visākhā first.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ay1:1.16_0: When she had invited her to that family.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ay1:1.17_0: When she arrived, she saw him sitting alone with that girl,
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ay1:1.19_0: “Venerable, it’s not appropriate for you to sit alone with a woman on a private and concealed seat suitable for action.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ay1:1.20_0: Although you may not be aiming at that act, people with little confidence are hard to convince.”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ay1:1.22_0: After leaving, Visākhā told the monks what had happened.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ay1:1.23_0: The monks of few desires complained and criticized Udāyī,
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ay1:1.24_0: “How can Venerable Udāyī sit alone with a woman on a such a seat?”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ay1:1.25_0: After rebuking him in many ways, they told the Buddha. Soon afterwards he had the Sangha gathered and questioned Udāyī:
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ay1:1.26_0: “Is it true, Udāyī, that you sat alone with a woman on a private and concealed seat suitable for action?”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ay1:1.29_0: “... Foolish man, how can you sit alone with a woman on a such a seat?
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-ay1:1.30_0: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...”...
